data.yamlPipeline:
pipeline:
  name: testPipeline_Cypress
  identifier: testPipeline_Cypress
  projectIdentifier: mtran2
  orgIdentifier: default
  tags: {}
  stages:
    - stage:
        name: CI_Stage1
        identifier: CI_Stage1
        description: ""
        type: CI
        spec:
          cloneCodebase: false
          infrastructure:
            type: KubernetesDirect
            spec:
              connectorRef: <+pipeline.variables.k8sCluster>
              namespace: default
              automountServiceAccountToken: true
              nodeSelector: {}
              os: Linux
          execution:
            steps:
              - step:
                  type: Run
                  name: RunStep
                  identifier: RunStep
                  spec:
                    connectorRef: <+input>
                    image: <+input>
                    shell: Sh
                    command: <+input>
                    privileged: <+input>
                    reports:
                      type: JUnit
                      spec:
                        paths: <+input>
                    envVariables: <+input>
                    outputVariables: <+input>
                    runAsUser: <+input>
                    resources:
                      limits:
                        memory: <+input>
                        cpu: <+input>
                  description: <+input>
                  timeout: <+input>
